title: what to do
body: im top as wukong vs heimer and i cant farm because wukong is melee and heimer has turrets what should i do?

replies.body: Heimer will push lane, get your jungler to gank and try to farm under tower.

Safe farm.
Safe farm = going for cs that isn't risky. Dying isn't worth 40 gold. Being too low hp to get the safe cs isn't worthwhile either.
If you can, try to let the wave push to your side of the lane and try to freeze it just before it hits your turret. You want to last hit only in this case as multiple hits will push the wave.

Donger likes to push to tower really early with his turrents just what donger players do what you would want to do it go merc and the ad mr item that goes into maw which then lets you to kill him as he is a squishy champion and once you hit 6 you can easily out trade him and ask for ganks when he is pushed. You can also use this for vsing Lulu as well as she is considered a counter to the ad bruisers.
